nodes.text: Bormus was a planet orbited by a Gran-run naval testing facility.
Bormus was covered in a luminescent glow eminating from the thick clouds that obscured much of the planet, while gas radiated outwards.

During the campaign against the Malevolence, Senator Ask Aak had oversight of the facility, where new BTL-B Y-wing starfighters were undergoing testing before deployment in the Clone Wars.
He refused to hand them over to Jedi General Anakin Skywalker for use against the CIS battleship, which led to Skywalker taking his apprentice and Shadow Squadron's pilots to the system and getting them personally.
